You are a helpful assistant You generate a concise, yet descriptive Chat name, for the following messages End of Chat.\n\nGenerate a concise Chat name for the above messages. Give only the Chat name as response.

Email Password Confirm Password
Email is required. Password is required. Confirm Password is required. Passwords do not match. Email is invalid. Password is too short! Wrong credentials!
Recovery email sent!
Your personas will appear here, Once you have them. Please name your persona before saving! Saved. Using default System message! Saved
Delete Persona Delete All Personas Are you sure you want to delete this persona? Are you sure you want to delete all personas in this device? %1$s Persona deleted! All Personas deleted!
Share Save Make Copy Delete Delete All Cancel Clear
Create Persona Customise Persona Create a persona to represent your bot
Default Persona Deleted Persona
Chat Chatting with %1$s "Send"
Persona Name System Message "You are a helpful assistant"
Settings Version %1$s Build %1$s
API Key Enter your OpenAI API Key here Caution Don\'t share your API key with anyone. Your API key is like a password to your account. If you share it with someone, they can use your account to make requests and incur charges. You can get your API key from %1$s https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys Tap here to visit OpenAI API page "Visit the OpenAI API page to get your API key API Key saved!
Managing tokens Language models read text in chunks called tokens. These tokens are the units used for measuring usage and billing. To learn more visit OpenAI\'s Chat Completion Guide https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/chat/managing-tokens
Usage Usage quotas When you sign up, youâ€™ll be granted an initial spend limit, or quota, and OpenAI will increase that limit over time as you build a track record with your application. If you need more tokens, you can always request a quota increase.
Usage Summary "Visit OpenAI's usage summary, for more accurate usage tracking" OpenAI Pricing "Learn more about OpenAI's pricing" https://openai.com/pricing Your Usage https://platform.openai.com/account/usage Reset Usage Local token counter reset!
Image Generation Small (256x256) Medium (512x512) Large (1024x1024)
Delete Account Are you sure you want to delete your account? Account deleted!
Back Dismiss
Your conversation has been saved.
Waiting for previous response. Request cancelled!
Delete All Bookmarked Chats? This action will remove all bookmarked chats from your device, and is irreversible. All bookmarked cleared!
Invalid API Key!
Display Appearance Dark Dark Mode Light Light Mode Auto System Default Use Dynamic Colors Changes the app\'s color scheme based on your system\'s theme. Use Minimal Header Makes the header more compact, minimal branding.
Account Logged in as Anonymous UID: %1$s Actions Link Account Link your account to your Google account. Sign Out Logs you out of the App. Deletes your account, and signs you out of the App.
API View or change your API Key. Enable Image Generation Allows generating Images using the API Usage Tokens Dollars Check your API usage information, and estimated cost.
Advanced API Settings Model The model to use for generating responses. Manage Timeouts to accommodate longer responses to prompts API Timeout Timeout is the time in seconds that the app will wait for a response from API before giving up. If your prompts require longer to generate, you can try increasing this value.
Auto-Generate Chat Title Automatically generates Title when saving Chats, uses OpenAI API
Manage Account View or change your account information.
Enable Shake to Clear Shake your phone to clear Chat message Shake Sensitivity Shake to test Shake triggered!
Message cleared! (Shake) Undo
Open Source Libraries
OpenAI Status Page Check the status of OpenAI\'s API. https://status.openai.com/
Enable User Generated Content Allow bots from the community to be displayed in the app
Analytics Enable Analytics Helps prioritize features, and improve the app.
About Icons and Images Attributions for icons and images used in the app. Licenses and Acknowledgement View the licenses and acknowledgements of the libraries used in this app.
App Information\ View information about the app.
External Links
Clear Community Cache "Remove all locally cached Community Bots and Bot Templates." All bots cleared!
BotForge is an unofficial OpenAI API client for Android. Version Build Number Privacy Policy View the privacy policy of the app. GitHub Submit an issue, bug or feature request https://dheshan.mohandass.com/posts/privacy https://github.com/L4TTiCe/BotForge Play Store Rate the app on the Play Store. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mohandass.botforge
Markdown Rendered as Markdown. Tap to render as Markdown.

Share Persona with Community Share your creation with community members. Persona shared! Alias is an emojis or short text that represent your persona, and help users distinguish between personas Choosing a relevant alias will help users identify your persona Description Describe your persona in a few words. This will help with discoverability. Tags Add Tags

Move to next page.
Welcome to\nBotForge! Your platform for creating and sharing Prompts.
Before we beginâ€¦ You will need an OpenAI API key to use this app. BotForge is an unofficial client for OpenAI\'s Chat API. We do not collect or store your API key. Tap to visit the OpenAI\'s API page to get your API key.
"Finally," Do you want to enable user generated content? User Generated Content Allow bots from the community to be displayed in the app Get Started
Export Export chat Export directory creation failed.

History Prompt Image Size: # of Images: Generate Images Next Image Previous Image Prompt cannot be empty! Images deleted! Delete all generated images? This will delete all generated images stored locally No images yet. Image deleted! Generate Variant This will generate a new variant of the image.
